snippet: The nominee for chairman of the Export-Import Bank is the latest casualty of a right-wing effort to derail agencies by refusing to confirm appointees.
abstract: Editorial fears Fred Hochberg, Pres Obama's nominee for chairman of Export-Import Bank, could become latest casualty of right-wing effort to derail agencies by refusing to confirm appointees to run them; condemns the holding up of Hochberg's nomination to make it impossible for bank to function.
lead_paragraph: The nominee for chairman of the Export-Import Bank is the latest casualty of a right-wing effort to derail agencies by refusing to confirm appointees.

headline.main: Abusing Nomination Votes to Change Policy
headline.print_headline: Abusing Nomination Votes to Change Policy
